Over 20 AerCap staff took part and the company pledged €3,600 to the charityA staff social event  helped raise over AUD $25,000 in support of Wires Australian Wildfire Rescue Organisation and Australian Red CrossAerCap supported the Dublin Simon Community House of Cards Appeal with a donation of over $12,000
The charity provides food, shelter and permanent supported housing to those who need it mostSupporting Milford, Our Lady’s and St Francis Hospices  to arrange specialist teams to make homecare visits to vulnerable patients in their homesOur 4
thyear 
supporting Movember
MoBros and MoSistas raised more than $10,000 for the Movemberand Breast Cancer Research Foundations in Ireland, Singapore and USAThe Society of St. Vincent de Paul “SVP Christmas Giving Tree Appeal” that helped to make Christmas that little bit brighter for children and families who are struggling in communities across the country
